name: SanMateoCreditUnion
0: ”Alexa, ask my S. M. C. U. what is my account balance?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my s. m. c. u.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
San Mateo Credit Union believes a healthy financial life helps our members lead healthier overall lives. We're committed to helping our members make smart decisions, take advantage of life's big opportunities, and plan for the future. Enjoy easy access to your account information with Alexa!

Disclaimer: Please be aware that the skill will read out the financial information (Ex: Account balance) loud.
